014.json.src: 児童扶養手当制度について（ご案内）
児童扶養手当は、手当を受ける方（以下「受給者」といいます。）と手当の対象となる児童（以下「対象児童」といいます。）が、受給資格を満たしていることを条件に認定されています。
014.json.mt: The child support allowance is approved on the condition that the recipient of the allowance (hereinafter referred to as the "recipient") and the child who is eligible for the allowance (hereinafter referred to as the "eligible child") satisfy the recipient qualification.

014.json.src: 認定された方には、下表の金額（月額）が、年６回（５月１１日、７月１０日、９月１１日、１１月１１日、１月８日、３月１１日）振り込まれます。
014.json.mt: For those who have been approved, the amount shown below (monthly) will be transferred six times a year (May 11, July 10, September 11, November 11, January 8, and March 11).

errors.text: 11, July 10, September 11, November 11, January 8, and March 11

014.json.src: ※金額は令和２年４月１日現在のものです。
以下の状況になった場合は、区役所民生子ども課民生子ども係（支所管内にお住まいの方は支所区民福祉課保護・子ども係）で手続きをしてください。
014.json.mt: In the following circumstances, please go through the procedure at the Civil Welfare and Children Section of the Civil Welfare and Children Division of the City Office (for those living in the jurisdiction of the branch office, the Protection Section of the Civil Welfare Division of the branch office).

errors.text: Civil Welfare and Children Section of the Civil Welfare and Children Division of the City Office
Protection Section of the Civil Welfare Division of the branch office

014.json.src: 必要な手続きが遅れ、手当が過払いとなった場合は、すでに支給された手当を返還していただくことになりますので、ご注意ください。
014.json.mt: Please note that if the necessary procedures are delayed and the allowance is overpaid, you will have to return the allowance already paid.

014.json.src: 受給資格を満たさなくなったとき
014.json.mt: When the recipient qualification is no longer satisfied

014.json.src: 婚姻＊した《父または母の場合》
＊事実上の婚姻関係（内縁関係）、異性との同居を含みます。
014.json.mt: * Includes de facto marriage (common-law marriage) and cohabitation with the opposite sex.

014.json.src: 公的年金を受けることができるようになった
014.json.mt: To be eligible for public pension benefits

014.json.src: （平成26年12月以降公的年金の額によっては、児童扶養手当を受給できる場合があります）
014.json.mt: (After December 2014, depending on the amount of public pension, you may be able to receive the child support allowance.)

014.json.src: 対象児童を監護（養育）しなくなった（面倒をみなくなった）
014.json.mt: The subject child is no longer looked after (no longer cared for).

errors.text: is no longer looked after (no longer cared for)

014.json.src: 対象児童と生計同一でなくなった《父の場合のみ》
014.json.mt: Only in the case of a father whose livelihood is no longer the same as that of the eligible child

errors.text: Only in the case of a father whose

014.json.src: 対象児童の父または母の死亡により支給される遺族補償を受けることができるようになった
014.json.mt: It became possible to receive the compensation for surviving family, which is paid when the father or mother of the subject child dies.

014.json.src: 日本国内に住所を有しなくなった
手当を受給する理由がなくなった
父または母が対象児童を遺棄する状態でなくなった
014.json.mt: The father or mother no longer abandons the child.

014.json.src: 父または母の拘禁が終了した
014.json.mt: The detention of a father or mother has ended

014.json.src: 児童福祉施設や少年院等に入所した
014.json.mt: A person who has been admitted to a child welfare institution or juvenile training school

014.json.src: 父または母の死亡により支給される公的年金を受けることができるようになった
014.json.mt: To be entitled to a public pension due to the death of a father or mother

014.json.src: 父または母に支給される公的年金の額の加算対象となった
014.json.mt: To be added to the amount of the public pension paid to the father or mother

014.json.src: （平成26年12月以降公的年金の額によっては、児童扶養手当を受給できる場合があります）
014.json.mt: (After December 2014, depending on the amount of public pension, you may be able to receive the child support allowance.)

014.json.src: 父または母の死亡により支給される遺族補償を受けることができるようになった
014.json.mt: To be entitled to survivors' compensation due to the death of the father or mother

014.json.src: １８歳に達した日の属する年度（３月３１日）が終了した
014.json.mt: The fiscal year in which the person reached the age of 18 (March 31) has ended

014.json.src: 障害の状態であることにより対象期間を延長している場合で、２０歳に達した、または障害認定の状態でなくなった
014.json.mt: If the period is extended due to disability status, and the person has reached the age of 20 or is no longer in the disability status.

014.json.src: 日本国内に住所を有しなくなった
受給資格喪失届または額改定届または公的年金給付等受給状況届
014.json.mt: Notification of Loss of Status of Receipt or Notification of Amount Revision or Notification of Receipt Status of Public Pension Benefit, etc.

014.json.src: 手当の受給資格の継続を確認するとき（毎年８月）
014.json.mt: Confirmation of continued eligibility for benefits (every August)

014.json.src: 手当を受給してから５年を経過したとき、及びその後の毎年８月
014.json.mt: Five years after receipt of the allowance, and every subsequent August

014.json.src: 離婚等の支給要件に該当してから７年を経過したとき、及びその後の毎年８月
014.json.mt: When seven years have passed since he / she became eligible for payment due to divorce, etc., and in August of each subsequent year

errors.text: When seven years have passed since he / she became

014.json.src: 一部支給停止適用除外事由届出書
014.json.mt: Reason for Exception from Partial Benefit Payment Suspension Notice

014.json.src: 状況等に変更があったとき（氏名、住所、世帯構成、公的年金の額の変更など）
014.json.mt: When there is a change in the situation, etc. (change in name, address, household composition, public pension amount, etc.)

014.json.src: 変更届・公的年金給付等受給状況届
014.json.mt: Notification of Change / Notification of Receiving Status of Public Pension Benefit, etc.

014.json.src: 《注意》平成２６年１２月１日以降、年金が受けられる場合であっても、年金額によっては児童扶養手当を受給することができる場合があります。
014.json.mt: <<Note>> After December 1, 2014, even if you can receive a pension, you may be able to receive a child support allowance depending on the amount of the pension.

014.json.src: 受け取った通知書について
あなたが受け取った通知書の内容は、次のとおりです。
014.json.mt: The contents of the notice you received are as follows.

014.json.src: あなたからの請求を審査した結果、手当の受給資格の認定をしたこと
014.json.mt: As a result of reviewing your claim, you have been qualified to receive the allowance.

errors.text: As a result of reviewing your claim, you have been qualified to receive the allowance.

014.json.src: あなたが手当の受給資格を満たさなくなったこと
014.json.mt: You are no longer eligible for benefits

014.json.src: あなたが監護（養育）する対象児童が減少したため、手当が減額されたこと
014.json.mt: The allowance has been reduced due to a decrease in the number of children you are responsible for (raising).

014.json.src: あなたが監護（養育）する対象児童が増加したため、手当が増額されたこと
014.json.mt: The allowance has been increased due to an increase in the number of children you are responsible for (raising).

014.json.src: 差止事由（現況届が提出されていない等）が発生したため、手当の支払いを一時差し止めたこと
014.json.mt: The payment of the allowance was temporarily suspended due to the occurrence of reasons for suspension (such as the fact that the Current Status Notice has not been submitted).

014.json.src: 差止事由が解消されたため、手当の支払差止めを解除したこと
014.json.mt: The suspension of payment of the allowance was lifted because the reason for the suspension was resolved.

014.json.src: あなたや、あなたと同居または生計を同じくする扶養義務者等の前年の所得が限度額以上であったため、手当の全部または一部の支給を停止したこと
014.json.mt: The payment of all or part of the allowance has been suspended because the income of you or a person under a duty to support you who lives with or shares living expenses with you in the previous year was above the limit.

014.json.src: 世帯構成の変更や所得更正等があったため、手当の支給停止を解除したこと
014.json.mt: The suspension of payment of the allowance was lifted due to changes in household composition, income reassessment, etc.

014.json.src: あなたの１１月から翌年１０月までの手当の支給について決定したこと
014.json.mt: Your decision regarding payment of the allowance from November to October of the following year

014.json.src: 受給者本人または扶養義務者等の前年（１月から９月の請求においては前々年）の所得（※受給者が対象児童の母の場合は、対象児童の父から、受給者が対象児童の父の場合は、対象児童の母から、受給者または対象児童が受け取った養育費の８割を所得に加算します。）から、適用される控除額を控除した額が、扶養親族数別に定められた限度額以上である場合は、支給停止の対象となります。
014.json.mt: If the amount obtained by deducting the applicable deduction from the income of the recipient or the person responsible for support, etc. in the previous year (the year before the previous year in the case of a request from January to September) (* If the recipient is the mother of the eligible child, 80% of the child support received by the recipient or the eligible child shall be added to the income from the father of the eligible child, and if the recipient is the father of the eligible child, 80% of the child support received by the recipient or the eligible child shall be added to the income from the mother of the eligible child) is more than the limit amount specified by the number of dependent relatives, the payment will be suspended.

errors.text: If the recipient is the mother of the eligible child, 80% of the child support received by the recipient or the eligible child shall be added to the income from the father of the eligible child, and if the recipient is the father of the eligible child, 80% of the child support received by the recipient or the eligible child shall be added to the income from the mother of the eligible child

014.json.mt: Addition due to old age dependency

014.json.src: 特定扶養等による加算
定額控除（すべての方に適用されます）

014.json.mt: Special Deduction for the Physically Disabled

errors.text: Special Deduction for the Physically Disabled

014.json.src: 障害者・寡婦＊１・寡夫＊２・勤労学生控除
014.json.mt: Handicapped person, widow * 1, widower * 2, Working Student Deduction
Special Income Tax Deduction for Spouses

014.json.src: 雑損・医療費・小規模企業共済等掛金控除
014.json.mt: Miscellaneous losses, medical expenses, and Small Business Mutual Aid Premium Deduction

errors.text: Small Business Mutual Aid Premium Deduction

014.json.src: 長期譲渡所得・短期譲渡所得に係る特別控除
014.json.mt: Special deduction for long-term capital gains / short-term capital gains

014.json.src: 寡婦・寡夫控除が適用されないひとり親について、寡婦・寡夫控除をみなし適用します(養育者及び扶養義務者に限る)。
014.json.mt: A single parent who is not eligible for widow / Widower's Deduction shall be deemed to be eligible for widow / Widower's Deduction (limited to a rearer or a person responsible for support).

014.json.src: ＊１ 受給者が母の場合は、特別寡婦控除及び寡婦控除は適用されません。
014.json.mt: * 1 If the recipient is the mother, Special Deduction for Widows and Widow's Deduction are not applicable.

014.json.src: ＊２ 受給者が父の場合は、寡夫控除は適用されません。
014.json.mt: * 2 If the beneficiary is the father, the Widower's Deduction will not be applied.

014.json.src: 〈例〉年間所得200万円、受給者が受け取った養育費40万円、対象児童が受け取った養育費10万円、児童3人、税法上の扶養親族3人で、扶養義務者等がいない場合
014.json.mt: <Example> Annual income of 2 million yen, child support of 400000 yen received by the recipient, child support of 100,000 yen received by the subject child, three children, three dependents under the tax law, and no person responsible for support.

014.json.src: 全部支給は163万円未満、一部支給は306万円未満、306万円以上は全額支給停止となります。
014.json.mt: The full payment will be less than 1.63 million yen, the partial payment will be less than 3.06 million yen, and the full payment will be stopped if it's more than 3.06 million yen.

014.json.src: 所得は養育費の８割を加算しますので、200万円＋(40万円＋10万円)×0.8＝240万円となります。
014.json.mt: Since 80% of Child Rearing Expenses is added to the income, 2 million yen + (400000 yen + 100,000 yen) x 0.8 = 2.4 million yen.

014.json.src: ここから控除額を引くと、240万円－8万円(定額控除)＝232万円となり、「一部支給」に該当します。
014.json.mt: Subtracting the amount of deduction from this, 2.4 million yen - 80000 yen (fixed amount deduction) = 2.32 million yen, which corresponds to "partial payment".
The monthly allowance for the first child is 43,150 yen - (2.32 million yen (income) - 1.63 million yen) x 0.0230559 = 27,240 yen.
10,180 yen - (2.32 million yen (income) - 1.63 million yen) × 0.0035524 = 7,730 yen for the second child
6,100 yen - (2.32 million yen (income) - 1.63 million yen) × 0.0021259 = 4,630 yen for the third child

014.json.src: この用紙は、古紙パルプを含む再生紙を使用しています。
014.json.mt: This paper is made from recycled paper including used paper pulp.
